summary: Rename the site from Spicy Food Corner to DailyKart and add a newly generated logo applied across the UI; keep existing WhatsApp-based ordering and admin/product management features unchanged, and add an English About Us page plus a home-page bottom section showing RKS brand/contact details.
architectural_notes: Target platform mentioned: Internet Computer (Motoko backend + React frontend).
Admin auth decision: custom username/password (not Internet Identity).
Fixed categories: Food and Grocery only.
User requests using an alternative admin login method/flow because current username/password login continues to fail ("Invalid password").
Customers can place multi-item orders via an Add-to-Cart + quantity selection flow, then 'Proceed to Order' opens an order form that sends the full order to WhatsApp.
Order form fields: Customer Name, Mobile Number, Delivery Address; product details auto-filled from cart and sent to WhatsApp.
Both options must remain available: direct per-product WhatsApp order and order-form/cart-based WhatsApp ordering.
Brand/name change requested: rename site/app to "DailyKart" and apply a generated logo.
Admin Panel credentials updated by user: username "9897743469", password "rk3469sa" (replace previous "foodram corner" / "ram4792sa").
known_issues: Admin panel login is failing and shows "invalid password" even when using the provided credentials (username "foodram corner", password "ram4792sa").
Admin Panel bug: after adding one product, the “Add Product/Add New Product” button disappears, preventing adding a second product.
Admin Panel login fails immediately with "A system error occurred. Please try again later."
Customer Panel does not load/display any products (no products visible).
New admin credentials were shared in chat; rotate/change password after setup to avoid exposure.

existing_features.title: Create a public Customer Panel page that loads and displays all products without requiring login. Display product image, name, price, and category, and support browsing by the two fixed categories (Food, Grocery).
Add an "Order on WhatsApp" button for each product that opens WhatsApp using a wa.me link to WhatsApp number 9897743469 with a pre-filled message including product name and price.

Create an Admin Panel UI with custom username/password login, and a protected product management area to add, edit, and delete products. Product form must include: image upload/selection, name, price, and category (Food|Grocery).

Implement product image handling end-to-end: admin can associate an image with a product, and the Customer Panel displays it reliably. Ensure images are optimized for mobile (reasonable size) and safe file types are enforced.
Add a Product Listing section/page that shows all products categorized (Food and Grocery) and stays consistent with admin changes (using shared product query/state).

Apply a coherent visual theme and branding across the site (Customer Panel + Admin Panel) using a warm, spicy street-food aesthetic (e.g., chili reds, saffron/orange, neutral background), consistent typography, and clear mobile-friendly layouts.
Add generated static branding images and use them in the UI: a logo and a hero/banner illustration for the Customer Panel.
Update the Admin Panel login validation to accept the exact admin credentials provided by the user: username "foodram corner" (including the space) and password "ram4792sa".

Fix Admin Panel login so that entering the exact admin credentials (username "foodram corner" including the space, password "ram4792sa") successfully logs in instead of showing an error like "Invalid password".

Update the frontend admin session logic to use the backend-issued admin session token (stored in sessionStorage) for route guarding and session persistence, instead of relying on caller-based `actor.isCallerAdmin()` checks.

Ensure all admin-restricted product management operations (create/update/delete) are authorized using the admin session token, so an admin who logged in via username/password can manage products successfully.

Fix the frontend admin login flow to authenticate against the backend login method (REQ-15), store the returned session token in `sessionStorage`, and stop using `actor.isCallerAdmin()` and the `adminAuthenticated` boolean flag as the source of truth.
Update `AdminRouteGuard` / admin session checking to validate authentication using the backend-issued admin session token stored in `sessionStorage` (and clear it if invalid/expired).

Ensure all frontend admin product mutations (create/update/delete) send or otherwise use the backend-issued admin session token so that product management works after logging in via username/password.

Implement a customer Add-to-Cart system that allows adding multiple different products, updating item quantities, removing items, and persisting the cart for the current browser session without requiring login.
Update the customer-facing product cards to provide both ordering options: keep the existing per-product “Order on WhatsApp” action and add an “Add to Cart” action.

Add a Cart page or Cart drawer (accessible from the site header navigation) that shows cart items with image, name, unit price, quantity controls, line total, and a cart summary with a “Proceed to Order” action.

Create a checkout Order Form that opens when the customer clicks “Proceed to Order” from the cart, collecting Customer Name, Mobile Number, and Delivery Address, and automatically including the selected cart product details (items + quantities).

On Order Form submission, generate a WhatsApp wa.me link to the existing WhatsApp number (9897743469 / 919897743469) containing a pre-filled message with customer details and the full multi-item cart (product names, quantities, and prices), then open WhatsApp in a new tab/window.

Update the frontend Admin Login flow to display an accurate error message based on the actual backend failure reason (e.g., distinguish invalid credentials from a network/actor error), while keeping all user-facing text in English.

Fix the Admin Dashboard UI so the admin can always access an "Add Product" action after creating the first product (i.e., the Add Product button must not disappear), allowing multiple products to be created in succession.

Improve the Admin Dashboard product management screen so the "Add Product" action is discoverable even when the product list is long (e.g., provide an additional in-context Add Product entry point near the product list and/or a persistent/sticky action on small screens), without removing the existing top action button.

Rename the app/site brand name to "DailyKart" across the frontend UI, replacing all visible occurrences of the old name (e.g., "Spicy Food Corner") including the browser tab title and any branding headings/text.
Add new generated branding images for "DailyKart" as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated, and update the UI to use them (logo in the hero and any other existing logo placements).
Update the site header branding block to use the generated DailyKart logo image instead of the current emoji-based icon, while keeping navigation and cart/admin actions unchanged.

Fix the Admin Panel login flow so that entering the correct credentials (username "foodram corner" including the space, password "ram4792sa") does not immediately fail with the generic message "A system error occurred. Please try again later." and instead either (a) successfully logs in and navigates to /admin/dashboard or (b) shows an accurate English error message that reflects the real failure reason (invalid credentials vs connectivity/system failure).

Improve admin-auth error normalization so common Internet Computer/agent errors (including reject/trap messages that wrap backend text like "Invalid credentials") are correctly classified and displayed in English, instead of falling back to the generic "A system error occurred. Please try again later.".

Fix product loading so the Customer Panel does not silently show "No products available" when the backend/actor is unavailable or product fetching fails; instead, it must show a clear English error state when products cannot be loaded, and only show an empty-state message when products were fetched successfully and the list is genuinely empty.

Apply the same corrected product-loading behavior to the Product Listing page so it does not display empty category sections when the product query failed; it must show an English error state on failures and only show empty-category messages on successful fetches with no items.

Add lightweight diagnostics (console logging only) around actor availability and failed calls for admin login and product fetching so that future issues can be debugged without changing user-facing text.

Fix the Admin Login error handling so that when login fails, the UI shows an accurate English error message (e.g., invalid credentials vs connectivity/system failure) instead of the generic message "A system error occurred. Please try again later." when the backend/IC agent error payload actually indicates a known cause.

Extend the frontend IC-agent error message extraction/parsing used by admin login to correctly detect the underlying canister trap/reject messages across common wrapper formats (e.g., reject message fields, replica reject strings), so normalization rules can match on the extracted message content reliably.

Ensure the Admin Login flow continues to rethrow and display backend failures without masking them as a generic system error, preserving the existing backend-provided failure reason whenever possible while still keeping user-facing text in English.

Ensure the Admin Login UI continues to display an accurate English error message when the new credentials are incorrect ("Invalid username or password") and continues to navigate to "/admin/dashboard" on successful login with the new credentials.

Create a new public "About Us" page in English that describes DailyKart as a local online ordering platform (not a direct seller), operating under RKS Brand, serving Vrindavan (nearby areas), and includes the provided Terms & Policy sections plus a Help Desk / Contact section.
Add navigation access to the new About Us page from the existing site header navigation (desktop and mobile) using the label "About Us".
Add a bottom section on the Home page ("/") that displays exactly these three items in English: Brand Name (RKS), Address (Vrindavan, Rukmani Vihar, Sector-2), and Contact Number (9897743469).

new_feature_requests.summary: Public customer panel to browse food & grocery products (image, name, price, category) without login; optimized for mobile and QR/link entry.
One-click 'Order on WhatsApp' per product using wa.me link with pre-filled order message to WhatsApp number 9897743469.
Admin/owner panel with custom username/password authentication (no Internet Identity).
Admin product management: add products with photo upload, name, price, category; update/delete; changes immediately reflect on customer panel.
Product listing panel/section showing all products categorized with auto-update when admin changes products; categories fixed to Food & Grocery (no admin-created categories).

Implement backend data storage and APIs for products with fixed categories: Food and Grocery. Each product must include: id, name, price, category (Food|Grocery), image (stored as a frontend static asset reference or stored content), createdAt, updatedAt.

Implement custom admin authentication using username/password (no Internet Identity). Support: (1) initial admin credential setup (first-run), (2) login returning a session token, (3) logout, (4) token validation for protected admin operations.

Implement proper custom admin authentication in the backend (Motoko) so the Admin Panel does not depend on Internet Identity principals or caller-based admin checks for login. Add backend methods to (1) authenticate the admin username/password and return a session token, and (2) validate a token for subsequent admin-only actions.
Change/replace the current admin login approach with an alternative method (since username/password login still fails with "Invalid password").

Implement backend custom admin authentication that does not rely on `AccessControl.isAdmin(caller)` or Internet Identity principals: add a login method that accepts the exact credentials username "foodram corner" and password "ram4792sa" and returns a backend-issued admin session token, plus a method to validate that token for subsequent admin authorization checks.

Update backend product management authorization to use the backend-issued admin session token (from REQ-15) instead of `AccessControl.isAdmin(accessControlState, caller)` for admin-restricted operations (create/update/delete products).
Add-to-Cart system: customers can add multiple products to a cart, adjust quantities, and proceed to checkout/order from the cart (no login).

Order Form checkout flow: on 'Proceed to Order' open a simple mobile-responsive form to collect Customer Name, Mobile Number, Delivery Address; auto-include selected cart product details (items + quantities) and send the complete order to WhatsApp.
Support both ordering options: keep direct 'Order on WhatsApp' per product AND cart/order-form-based WhatsApp ordering, letting customers choose either method.

Fix backend admin credential validation so that logging in with username "foodram corner" (including the space) and password "ram4792sa" succeeds reliably and does not incorrectly return an invalid-credentials error.
Make backend admin session tokens robust: generate a unique, hard-to-guess session token per successful login and store it so that `isAdminSession(token)` returns true immediately after login.

Fix Admin Panel product management UI so the “Add Product / Add New Product” button remains visible after adding the first product, allowing multiple products to be added (no one-product-only limitation).
Rename/retitle the website/app to "DailyKart" across the UI (headers, titles, branding text) and update any displayed brand name accordingly.
Generate a new "DailyKart" logo and apply it across the site (e.g., header/navbar and relevant pages).
Change the Admin Panel login credentials to username "9897743469" and password "rk3469sa" (replacing the previous credentials).

Update the backend admin credential validation so that the only accepted Admin Panel login credentials are username "9897743469" and password "rk3469sa" (replacing the previously accepted credentials).

Add a new About Us page in English describing DailyKart as a local ordering platform (not a direct seller) under RKS Brand, including basic Terms & Policy (order/payment/delivery/cancellation/responsibility) and service area Vrindavan.
Add a bottom section (footer-style) on the Home Page showing: Brand Name (RKS), Address (Vrindavan, Rukmani Vihar, Sector-2), and Contact Number (9897743469) in English.
